channel.title: WSC CTF on Sonam
channel.description: Recent content in WSC CTF on Sonam

item.title: WSC CTF 2024 Quals
item.description: Recently, I got the chance to play the WSC CTF challenge organized by We Shield Cyber and sponsored by NCA Nepal and Hack@sec. There was an OSINT challenge titled “A Challenge Worth iPhone 16 Pro Max” with a description and an image provided. Description: My friend, currently in Canada, sent me a picture of an institute with a challenge: if I can pinpoint the exact location, he'll reward me with a brand-new iPhone 16 Pro Max.
